description.p: PolyBoRi is a special purpose computer algebra system for computations in Boolean Rings.

The core of PolyBoRi is a C++ library, which provides high-level data types for Boolean polynomials and related structures. As a unique approach, binary decision diagrams are used as internal storage type for polynomial structures. On top of this, we provide a Python interface for parsing of complex polynomial systems, as well as for sophisticated and extendable strategies for Gr√∂bner base computation.
